value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. value.title: Relative Time Slicer in Power BI
